content:
From: vikram singh <vikramsmsjpr@gmail.com>
Sir
I have downloaded and installed Isabelle proof assistant. I have already
studied the book. but I am not able to compile the program. I searched a lot
but didnt fine a any book or material that can help me to compile and run
code. sir please help me

From: Jasmin Blanchette <jasmin.blanchette@gmail.com>
Dear Vikram,

The Isabelle versions at

http://www.cl.cam.ac.uk/research/hvg/Isabelle/download.html

are already compiled and prepackaged. These instructions should be fairly detailed and accurate. If this still don't work, please provide more information (what steps you did, which platform, etc.) and maybe somebody can help you.

Regards,

Jasmin
